name: SpaceBox
description:
Run away from spikey walls eating up your space! Save your cute face by all means!
Pick up "SPACE PACKS" to get some extra space.
Find a flag to finish a game.

Controls:
* Move Left/Right: Arrow Keys
* Jump: Up
* Restart: Z

Ludum dare #42 Jam entry

Code: BOOtak  (https://github.com/BOOtak)

Main character design: m_hawk

Title art: Valeria Zimnitskaya
